introduction: Elaric is the premiere autonomous coding agent. Get ready to architect, code, debug, and boost your productivity like you've never seen before. To continue, Elaric requires an API key.
notice: To get started, this extension needs an API provider.
chooseProvider: To do its magic, Elaric needs an API key.
startRouter: We recommend using an LLM Router:
startCustom: Or you can bring your provider API key:

telemetry.title: Help Improve Elaric
telemetry.anonymousTelemetry: Send error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. No code, prompts, or personal information is ever sent.
telemetry.changeSettings: You can always change this at the bottom of the <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink>
